welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oatfield, where the charming small-town atmosphere meets endless opportunities for adventure! Explore our historic landmarks, taste our delicious local delicacies, and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Oatfield."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Portland International Airport serves primarily domestic flights operated by Alaska Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Portland International Airport serves primarily domestic flights operated by American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Portland International Airport serves domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Portland Airport mainly serves smaller regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mal Airport is a small and simple building with basic facilities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
